name: All that Shines Belongs to Me

description.value: You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} for 1 round, then Stride. Each enemy adjacent to you at any point during this movement must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classDC.value)] save against your class DC or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 minute; if a creature critically fails their save against this effect, they are permanently blinded instead. For each creature blinded by this effect, the duration of the granted invisibility increases by 1 round as you hide yourself in their stolen light.
